mapper.select: select * from t_file_resource t where t.objId=#{id} and t.`type`=3 order by t.sort
select * from t_file_resource t where t.objId=#{id} and t.`type`=2 order by t.sort
mapper.insert: insert into t_goods( title, goodsTypeId, coverImg, costPrice, sellPrice, createDate, updateDate ) SELECT #{title}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{coverImg}, #{costPrice}, #{sellPrice}, NOW(), NOW() FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_goods WHERE title = #{title} and goodsTypeId =#{goodsTypeId})
mapper.delete: delete from t_goods where id in #{item}
mapper.update: update t_goods set title=#{title}, goodsTypeId=#{goodsTypeId}, coverImg=#{coverImg}, `costPrice`=#{costPrice}, `sellPrice`=#{sellPrice}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
update t_goods set status =#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.coverImg, t.goodsTypeId, d.name as typeDesc, t.costPrice, t.sellPrice, t.sellCount, t.`status`, t.createDate, t.updateDate FROM t_goods t JOIN t_goods_type d ON t.goodsTypeId = d.id WHERE t.id=#{id}
